amendment.description: To provide liability protection to volunteer pilot nonprofit organizations that fly for public benefit and to the pilots and staff of such nonprofit organizations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 6 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 6 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S536; text: CR S536) To provide liability protection to volunteer pilot nonprofit organizations that fly for public benefit and to the pilots and staff of such nonprofit organizations, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
